hero.title: Hi! I'm Akilles.
hero.description: I code, make music and design things.

my_coding.title: My skills as a full stack developer
my_coding.description:
As of 2024, I'm working full-time as a Full Stack Developer in fintech. I like to create neat utility scripts, write APIs, visualize data with plots and experiment with machine learning models using Python.

I'm also maintaining anodet, an open source convolutional neural net anomaly detection model based on ResNet and PatchCore.

While I'm currently in favor of backend development, I do have a passion for user interface and visual design. I enjoy building mockups and wireframes, creating digital marketing material and experimenting with different web frameworks.

In 2024 I finished my studies at IT-HÃ¶gskolan ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª, where I graduated in machine learning.

featured_projects.name: UCI Dataset Loader
featured_projects.description: Interface for performing data analysis tasks.

my_ethics.title: AI Ethics
my_ethics.description:
I believe responsible AI is about owning up to the consequences of what we create. Whether it's avoiding bias in algorithms or being upfront about how data driven decisions are made, it's all about being accountable.

Then there's data integrity, the backbone of ethical AI. I make sure the data we feed our models is solid, reliable, and fair. Let's keep the data clean; garbage in, garbage out.

principles.title: Data Integrity
principles.description: Using clean, unbiased data to train AI systems

principles.title: Transparency
principles.description: Being clear about AI decision-making processes

my_music.title: I also produce music
my_music.description:
I've been creating electronic music for over 10 years and I enjoy all aspects of it, from the creative composition and chord improvisation to the mathematical signal processing and mixing techniques.

The genres I'm moving between are mainly dubstep, hip hop, some drum & bass and house. I've experimented with psy-trance and lofi hip hop and produced some video game music.

Click an album below to have a listen, or follow me on SoundCloud to keep up with my latest releases!

my_stack.title: #my-stack | What I work with
my_stack.description:
Machine Learning and Data Science

As a developer interested in machine learning, I have experience working with TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch and scikit-learn for building and managing machine learning models. As my work involves cleaning and processing data, I'm well-versed in data pipelines.

My data collection skills extend to web scraping with tools like Selenium and BeautifulSoup. For statistical analysis I rely heavily on Pandas. When it comes to data visualization, I'm proficient with matplotlib, seaborn, and plotly.

Web Development and Engineering

In terms of backend development, I've created APIs with Flask and SQLAlchemy, and I'm comfortable managing databases with PostgreSQL, MongoDB and GraphQL. As a Data Engineer, I've designed and managed scalable data pipelines and infrastructure using Azure DevOps and Google BigQuery.

Though my work primarily focuses on data, I also enjoy web development, where I use frameworks like Anvil, Streamlit and React+Node.js. But I'm also comfortable with the oldschool stack of JS, HTML & CSS.
